description:
Itâ€™s a Code Red from the Galactic Fire Brigade! Planet Land is combusting and everything is ablaze! Return to HQ immediately and pick up your Infinity Dousing Apparatus; your Siren Helmet is still authorized and up to code! The mission: to fight the inferno and extricate the reformed Hooligan sisters! Now, suit up and start soaking some scenery!

The sequel to the universally acclaimed Mighty Switch Force, and the newest game in the Mighty series!

Grab your new weapon, a super-powered fire hose, and embark on a treacherous search-and-rescue mission!

Familiar friends and foes return, along with exciting new ones!

3D puzzles and brain-banding action return!

Check out the theme inspired by this game in the Theme Shop. Just tap the icon in the upper left corner of your Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu to get started.
name: Mighty Switch Force! 2
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
